episode_event_valentine_2026/4001_1101_0:
One day, with Palentine’s Day just around
the corner...
episode_event_valentine_2026/4001_1001_0:
Oh. Come to think of it, I never told you
about Eevee.

Apparently, there’s a group of Eevee
enthusiasts on Pasio who like to meet up.

After they saw my bond with my Leafeon,
they entrusted me with this Eevee.
I’m excited to see the bond we’ll form!

Hm? What’s everyone so excited about?
And what’s that smell?

Hello there! Interested in some delicious
sweets perfect for Palentine’s Day?

Impressive as always, Katy! You’re so
talented!
episode_event_valentine_2026/4001_1001_1:
So this is the work of Paldea’s superfamous
patissier... I have so much to learn!
Oh, they’re sweets for Palentine’s Day!
episode_event_valentine_2026/6801_1001_0:
You should express gratitude right away,
while it’s still fresh!
Fresh? Why are you talking like a chef?

Besides, sometimes words aren’t enough,
y’know?

It’s important to think about what truly makes
someone happy!
episode_event_valentine_2026/4002_1001_0:
Palentine’s Day is a time for expressing
gratitude, right?
I heard people give special gifts today.

I wanna show my appreciation for the
people and Pokémon who’ve always
looked out for me. Hmm...

Oh! I see thou mightst be in some sort
of trouble.
I could lend thee an ear, if thou so wishest.
I am Atticus, one of the Team Star bosses.

And one who has a burning passion for
all things ninja!
episode_event_valentine_2026/4002_1001_1:
Upon hearing thou art a ninja apprentice,
Adaman, I could not contain myself!
Thus have I come to meet thee!

You want to be a ninja? Because those are
some pretty flashy colors...
Well, well! Tell me thy woes!
I see... Well, a fine idea comes to mind!

Express thy gratitude with an outfit perfect
for Palentine’s Day!

An outfit? You mean dress up instead of
giving a gift?

Throughout history, it hath been custom to
don special garb upon days of celebration.

Therefore, rather than merely bestow a gift,
become the very image of thy gratitude!
episode_event_valentine_2026/4002_1001_2:
That seems kinda over the top...but I guess
that’s one way to do it!
Well, time’s a-wastin’! Let’s get going!

Indeed! ’Tis wise to hasten! I’ll make your
outfit at once.

And I shall ask Lady Valerie and the others
to lend their aid!

Sorry, [Name:PlayerNickname ]! I think
we’ll have to end it here for today.
I hope you look forward to my special outfit!

That guy... That’s Adaman, right? He seemed
really pumped.
I see... An outfit for Palentine’s Day, eh?
I guess that’s one way to express gratitude.
episode_event_valentine_2026/4003_1001_0: I have people I’d like to thank, too.

Like my friends from Paldea’s Pokémon
League...

and some Gym Leaders from other regions,
like Whitney and Misty.

The three of us became close friends when
we worked on that Pasio signature sweet
campaign.

My Clodsire and Misty’s Quagsire especially
hit it off!
So Misty gave me a Wooper.

this Quagsire! Isn’t she so gosh-darn
adorable?

As thanks for bringing Quagsire into my
life, I wanna do something extra special
for Misty.
episode_event_valentine_2026/4003_1001_1: I’ve been thinking hard about what.

I hear Misty really looks up to Lorelei,
of Kanto’s Elite Four.

Should I go as the strong and cool Elite Four
version of me?
Or is the typical friendly version better?
Hmm... Which would she appreciate more?

*chuckle* I’m surprised even you can feel
stuck sometimes, Rika!

Oh! Hey, Katy. Y’know, it’s rude to
eavesdrop!

I’m sorry. I knew you were talking about
Palentine’s Day, so I couldn’t help myself.
Since I’m here, I have a question for you.

Between your serious side and your playful
side, which is the real you?
episode_event_valentine_2026/4003_1001_2: Both are true parts of me.
I don’t think there’s one right answer.
I have two sides to me as well.

Huh? Are you saying you’re two-faced,
Katy?

Oh no, nothing like that. I just mean my two
sides as a Gym Leader.

Most of the time, I go soft on Trainers,
at La Primera’s request.
But I also want to show my true skill!
That’s what my sweet little bugs want, too!
episode_event_valentine_2026/4003_1001_3: Yeah, it’s important to honor both.

Which is why I don’t think you have to stick
to just one version of yourself!
But if it’s hard for you to switch mindsets...
episode_event_valentine_2026/4004_1001_0: Hey hey! Rika here, at your service!

I knew it! The last time I saw you was at
Raihan and Poppy’s friend-making battle!

Nahahaha! Must be ’cause I leveled up this
beauty of mine with this special outfit!

You’re looking pretty spiffy yourself,
Adaman.
Thanks! You’ve got a cool, modern look, too!

I can show both my serious side and my
casual side...
episode_event_valentine_2026/4004_1001_1:
This must be what Katy meant by showing
both sides of myself!

I’ve gotta thank Atticus and the others for
this outfit.
Oh, they made your outfit too, Adaman?
And I take it they also made yours?
Yup. Katy introduced me to them.

Apparently, that Atticus kid wants to become
a fashion designer.

I hope he gives it his all and achieves
his dream!
Anyway, time wasted is lost! Let’s get going!

Oh yeah, I better bring those sweets Katy
gave me.
episode_event_valentine_2026/4004_1001_2: I look extra pretty today, don’t I?

Since it’s Palentine’s Day, I wanted to say
thanks...

You guessed it! She’s the Wooper you gave
me. Can you believe how big she is?
That’s incredible, Rika! She’s so grown up!

We should go play in the water with our
partners sometime!
episode_event_valentine_2026/4004_1001_3: Off to a good start, huh?

Hm? You want to know where Sylveon
came from?

Can’t you tell? He’s the Eevee I introduced
you to the other day. He evolved!

I like to think he wanted to show his thanks
in a tangible way.

So I wanted to do the same for Sylveon—to
show my gratitude through my outfit!

I’m so thankful for Palentine’s Day—and for
Atticus and the others making this outfit just
how I imagined it!
All right. I think I’ll go find the others.
episode_event_valentine_2026/4005_1001_0:
Looks like we got to talk to almost everyone
who’s been there for us.

I still have a lot more to thank, but there’s
one person I just gotta talk to.

[Name:PlayerNickname ] is always
looking out for me.
So I’ve gotta thank [EN:Gen Ref="255" M="him" F="her" ] properly!

How about a competition to see who can
make [Name:PlayerNickname ] happier?
